segments.source_content:
---
title: SAML SSO Providers
sidebar_label: SSO Providers
---
SAML Jackson supports the following SSO providers:

translations.zh-CN: SAML Jackson 支持以下 SSO 提供商：

segments.source_content:
- [Generic SAML 2.0 Provider](./generic-saml.md)
- [Microsoft Entra ID (formerly Azure AD)](./azure.md)
- [Microsoft AD FS](./microsoft-adfs.md)
- [Okta](./okta.md)
- [Auth0](./auth0.md)
- [Google](./google.md)
- [OneLogin](./onelogin.md)
- [PingOne](./pingone.md)
- [JumpCloud](./jumpcloud.md)
- [Rippling](./rippling.md)
- [OpenID Connect Provider](./generic-oidc.md)

translations.zh-CN:
- [通用 SAML 2.0 提供商](./generic-saml.md)
- [Microsoft Entra ID（原 Azure AD）](./azure.md)
- [Microsoft AD FS](./microsoft-adfs.md)
- [Okta](./okta.md)
- [Auth0](./auth0.md)
- [Google](./google.md)
- [OneLogin](./onelogin.md)
- [PingOne](./pingone.md)
- [JumpCloud](./jumpcloud.md)
- [Rippling](./rippling.md)
- [OpenID Connect 提供商](./generic-oidc.md)
